title: Thailand’s tourism recovery remains subdued
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
Thailand saw just 3.78 million tourist arrivals from January to mid-August, a government official said on August 19 as arrival numbers are just slowly recovering from the great Covid-19 slump during the past two years. The arrivals were mainly from
